## hpr2588 :: Miniature painting

 Tuula rambles about miniature painting while painting some ancient British units (horses for chariots to be specific) for De Bellis Antiquitatis.

De Bellis Antiquitatis is a quick to learn, quick to play war game for ancient period (and a bit more) - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/De_Bellis_Antiquitatis
Army Painter is paint, brush and basing manufacturer - https://www.thearmypainter.com/
Osprey Publishing specializes in publishing books on modeling and history - https://ospreypublishing.com/
